Uthman (Arabic: عثمان, romanized: ʿUthman), sụkwara Othman, bụ aha nwoke Arab e nyere aha nke nwere mpụtara izugbe nke “amamihe, kacha ike, nke nwere nghọta”
Ọ na-ewu ewu dị ka aha nwoke nyere n'etiti ndị Alakụba

A                                                                                                                                                          enweghị /θ/                       kpọkwa agwa ahụ n'ụzọ dị iche
